general_advisory: As per extended range of forecast received from IMD, fairly widespread to widespread rain/thundershower is very likely over districts of Odisha during week-2 (5th to 11th July 2024) and overall rainfall activity likely to be slightly above normal. Also, possibility of isolated heavy to very heavy rain over the districts of Odisha during week-2 (5th to 11th July 2024). There is low probability of formation of another low-pressure area over north Bay of Bengal with northwestwards movement.
